get.description:
Get usage metrics for the authenticated organization.

    **Authentication:** Requires valid API key in 'api-key' header.
    The organization is automatically deduced from the API key via VerifyTokenMiddleware.

    **Date Range Defaults:**
    - If `start_date` is not provided, defaults to 30 days ago
    - If `end_date` is not provided, defaults to current time (with buffer applied)

    **Data Completeness:** Metrics include only completed sessions, test runs,
    and datapoints. A configurable time buffer may be applied to ensure data completeness.

    **Metrics Included:**
    - **voice_minutes**: Sum of audio/voice minutes from completed sessions
    - **simulations**: Count of completed test runs (all types: voice and non-voice)
    - **datapoints**: Count of non-error datapoints
    - **checks**: Total check executions from test runs and monitors

    **Example Usage:**
    ```
    # Last 30 days (default)
    GET /v0/usage/metrics

    # Specific date range
    GET /v0/usage/metrics?start_date=2026-01-01T00:00:00Z&end_date=2026-01-31T23:59:59Z

    # Custom start, default end
    GET /v0/usage/metrics?start_date=2026-01-01T00:00:00Z
    ```

parameters.name: start_date

schema.description: Start date for metrics period (ISO 8601 or YYYY-MM-DD). Defaults to 30 days ago if not provided.
schema.title: Start Date

parameters.description: Start date for metrics period (ISO 8601 or YYYY-MM-DD). Defaults to 30 days ago if not provided.

parameters.name: end_date

schema.description: End date for metrics period (will be capped based on buffer). Defaults to current time with buffer applied.
schema.title: End Date

parameters.description: End date for metrics period (will be capped based on buffer). Defaults to current time with buffer applied.

parameters.name: project_id

schema.description: Optional project filter - only include metrics for this project
schema.title: Project Id

parameters.description: Optional project filter - only include metrics for this project

parameters.name: precision

schema.description: Time period precision: MINUTE (max 180 min), HOUR (max 168 hrs), DAY (max 90 days), MONTH (max 3 months)

parameters.description: Time period precision: MINUTE (max 180 min), HOUR (max 168 hrs), DAY (max 90 days), MONTH (max 3 months)

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the Check to delete

project_id.title: Project Id
project_id.description: Project ID or None for default project

check_id.title: Check Id
check_id.description: When provided, update existing check by ID (allows name change)

check_type.title: Check Type
check_type.description: Type of check: code (code-based) or model (model-based judge prompt).

check_config.title: Check Config
check_config.description: Check config: code_contents for code-based, prompt_template for model-based.

CheckValidateRequest.title: CheckValidateRequest
CheckValidateRequest.description: Request body for POST /check_validate. Validates check code or prompt without persisting.

valid.title: Valid
valid.description: True if the check passed validation.

message.title: Message
message.description: Error or warning message when valid is False.

context_token.description: Context token is a unique token to link various datapoints which originate from the same context

model_metadata.title: Model Metadata
model_metadata.description: Additional metadata about the model used for this datapoint

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Tags are strings that can be used to filter datapoints in the Okareo app

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.description: Feedback is a 0 to 1 float value that captures user feedback range for related datapoint results

context_token.title: Context Token
context_token.description: Context token is a unique token to link various datapoints which originate from the same context

search_value.title: Search Value
search_value.description: Search substring that is matched against input, result, context_token, tags, or time_created fields

datapoint_ids.title: Datapoint Ids
datapoint_ids.description: List of datapoint IDs to filter by

group.title: Group
group.description: The group name or datetime for the data summary.

feedback_ranges.title: Feedback Ranges
feedback_ranges.description: List of feedback range summaries for the date.

datapoints.title: Datapoints
datapoints.description: The total count of datapoints for the group.

issues.title: Issues
issues.description: The total count of issues for the group.

errors.title: Errors
errors.description: The total count of errors for the group.

avg_latency.title: Avg Latency
avg_latency.description: The average latency for the group.

sum_cost.title: Sum Cost
sum_cost.description: The total cost for the group.

user_metadata.title: User Metadata
user_metadata.description: Number of distinct values found for each key in user metadata for the group.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Tags are strings that can be used to filter datapoints in the Okareo app

resolved.title: Resolved
resolved.description: If the datapoint is resolved or not

model_id.title: Model Id
model_id.description: Model ID of the driver model

prompt_template.title: Prompt Template
prompt_template.description: Prompt template for the driver model

voice_instructions.title: Voice Instructions
voice_instructions.description: Voice instructions for the driver model

voice_profile.title: Voice Profile
voice_profile.description: Voice profile for the driver model. Select from the following list of options: friendly, angry, confused, whispering, shouting, annoyed, urgent.

voice.title: Voice
voice.description: Voice setting for the driver model. Use GET /v0/voices to retrieve available voice options.

language.title: Language
language.description: Language code in BCP-47 format (e.g., 'en-US', 'es-MX', 'ja', 'fr-CA'). For voice targets, improves STT accuracy by constraining language model. If not specified, defaults to 'multi' for automatic language detection.

language.title: Language
language.description: BCP-47 language code (e.g., 'en', 'es', 'fr-CA', 'ja') for the driver prompt. Specifies what language the driver should always and only respond to. Defaults to 'en' (English) if not provided.

scenario_id.title: Scenario Id
scenario_id.description: ID of the scenario set to evaluate

datapoint_ids.title: Datapoint Ids
datapoint_ids.description: List of datapoint IDs to filter by

metrics_kwargs.title: Metrics Kwargs
metrics_kwargs.description: Dictionary of metrics to be measured

filter_group_id.title: Filter Group Id
filter_group_id.description: ID of the datapoint filter group to apply

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Tags are strings that can be used to filter test runs in the Okareo app

checks.title: Checks
checks.description: List of checks to include in the test run.

type.description: The type of test run will determine which relevant model metrics should be calculated

test_run_id.title: Test Run Id
test_run_id.description: ID for the test run. Used when 'submit_test' has already been called.

user_input.title: User Input
user_input.description: Primary user instruction for generation. When set, used instead of description for the LLM prompt.

description.title: Description
description.description:
Description for the evaluator.
            When this request is sent to generate an evaluator, this field will be used to generate it (or user_input if set).

requires_scenario_input.title: Requires Scenario Input
requires_scenario_input.description: Whether the evaluator requires scenario input

requires_scenario_result.title: Requires Scenario Result
requires_scenario_result.description: Whether the evaluator requires scenario expected result

output_data_type.title: Output Data Type
output_data_type.description: Evaluator output data type (i.e., bool, int, float)

prior_code.title: Prior Code
prior_code.description: Existing code to refine (code branch). When set, LLM is asked to modify/improve it.

prior_prompt.title: Prior Prompt
prior_prompt.description: Existing prompt to refine (model branch). When set, LLM is asked to revise it.

feedback_range_start.title: Feedback Range Start
feedback_range_start.description: The start of the feedback range.

count.title: Count
count.description: The total count of feedbacks in the specified range for the given date.

field_key.title: Field Key
field_key.description: Key of the User Metadata field to filter on. Ignored for other 'field' values

scenario_data_point_id.title: Scenario Data Point Id
scenario_data_point_id.description: ID of the scenario data point

project_id.title: Project Id
project_id.description: Project UUID to fetch traces from

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Tags are strings that can be used to filter test runs in the Okareo app

types.title: Types
types.description: List of test run types to filter by. If provided, only test runs matching these types will be returned.

return_model_metrics.title: Return Model Metrics
return_model_metrics.description: Boolean value indicating if model metrics should be returned. This increases the response size.

return_error_matrix.title: Return Error Matrix
return_error_matrix.description: Boolean value indicating if error matrix should be returned. This increases the response size.

available_models.title: Available Models
available_models.description: List of available models with provider and display information.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Tags are strings that can be used to filter groups in the Okareo app

MetricDetail.title: MetricDetail
MetricDetail.description: Metrics for a specific time period.

voice_minutes.title: Voice Minutes
voice_minutes.description: Total voice/audio minutes captured (completed sessions only)

simulations.title: Simulations
simulations.description: Count of completed test runs (all types: voice and non-voice)

checks.title: Checks
checks.description: Total check executions (from completed test runs and monitors)

app_link.title: App Link
app_link.description: This URL links to the Okareo webpage for this model

models.title: Models
models.description: Models to be added for testing

version.title: Version
version.description: Version of the model under test. Defaults to 1 if not provided.

sensitive_fields.title: Sensitive Fields
sensitive_fields.description: List of sensitive fields in the model to redact. Should include nested fields, e.g. ['headers.authorization', 'body.password']

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Tags are strings that can be used to filter models in the Okareo app

update.title: Update
update.description: If set to true, the model will be updated instead of returning the existing model

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Tags are strings that can be used to filter projects in the Okareo app

seed_data.title: Seed Data
seed_data.description: Seed data is a list of dictionaries, each with an input and result

generation_type.description: Generation type of the uploaded scenario. Default is SEED.

source_scenario_id.title: Source Scenario Id
source_scenario_id.description: ID for the scenario set that the generated scenario set will use as a source. Will throw an exception if 'source_scenario_rows' is also provided.

source_scenario_rows.title: Source Scenario Rows
source_scenario_rows.description: Rows for the scenario set that the generated scenario set will use as a source. Will throw an exception if 'source_scenario_id' is also provided.

synonym_sets.title: Synonym Sets
synonym_sets.description: 2D list used by the generator to determine synonyms. Used with the SYNONYMS generation type.

save_generated_scenario.title: Save Generated Scenario
save_generated_scenario.description: Whether to save the generated scenarios. Defaults to True.

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the generated scenario set

number_examples.title: Number Examples
number_examples.description: Number of examples to be generated for the scenario set

generation_type.description:
Type of generation. Current supported scenario types are:
Seed: Seed data for a scenario set
Rephrase invariant: Results will be rephrased versions of inputs
Conditional: Results will be rephrased inputs represented in a conditional format
Text reverse question: The result will be the target question for the input
Text reverse label: The result will be the intent of the target question for the input

generation_tone.description: Tone to use for scenario generation.

generation_prompt.title: Generation Prompt
generation_prompt.description: Prompt for the generator to use when generating scenarios. Only supported by CustomGenerator type.

generation_schema.title: Generation Schema
generation_schema.description: Structured output schema for the generator to use when generating scenarios. Only supported by CustomGenerator type.

pre_template.title: Pre Template
pre_template.description: Template for pre-processing scenario before sending it to generator

post_template.title: Post Template
post_template.description: Template for post-processing scenario after generator before it's saved

lock_result.title: Lock Result
lock_result.description: Whether to lock the result of the generated scenario. Used in the Custom Generator type.

checks.title: Checks
checks.description: List of check names or check configs to run on the generated scenarios

app_link.title: App Link
app_link.description: This URL links to the Okareo webpage for this scenario set

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Tags are strings that can be used to filter scenario sets in the Okareo app

seed_data.title: Seed Data
seed_data.description: Seed data is a list of dictionaries, each with an input and result

filters.title: Filters
filters.description: List of filter conditions to apply. Defaults to None (i.e., all datapoints).

checks.title: Checks
checks.description: List of checks to only flag issues for. Defaults to None (i.e., all checks).

timezone.title: Timezone
timezone.description: IANA timezone to use for date filtering/aggregation (e.g., 'America/New_York'). Defaults to None (i.e., UTC).

precision.title: Precision
precision.description: Time precision for the summary. Valid values include ['day', 'hour', 'minute']. Defaults to 'day'.

filter_group_id.title: Filter Group Id
filter_group_id.description: Filter group ID to search with

group_column.title: Group Column
group_column.description: Column to group by for the summary. Overwrites the default time-based grouping for the summary.

start_session_params.title: Start Session Params
start_session_params.description: API parameters to start a session. Optional

next_message_params.title: Next Message Params
next_message_params.description: API parameters to get the next message in the session.

end_session_params.title: End Session Params
end_session_params.description: API parameters to end a session. Optional.

mut_id.title: Mut Id
mut_id.description: ID of the model to use for the custom endpoint. Optional.

sensitive_fields.title: Sensitive Fields
sensitive_fields.description: List of sensitive fields to redact in the response. Optional.

start_session_raw_response.title: Start Session Raw Response
start_session_raw_response.description: Raw response from the start session endpoint, if applicable.

next_message_raw_response.title: Next Message Raw Response
next_message_raw_response.description: Raw response from the next message endpoint.

end_session_raw_response.title: End Session Raw Response
end_session_raw_response.description: Raw response from the end session endpoint, if applicable.

scenario_data_point_id.title: Scenario Data Point Id
scenario_data_point_id.description: ID of the scenario data point

prompt_template.title: Prompt Template
prompt_template.description: Prompt template for the driver model. If not provided, backend will generate one based on language parameter.

voice_instructions.title: Voice Instructions
voice_instructions.description: Voice instructions for the driver model

voice_profile.title: Voice Profile
voice_profile.description: Voice profile for the driver model. Select from the following list of options: friendly, angry, confused, whispering, shouting, annoyed, urgent.

voice.title: Voice
voice.description: Voice setting for the driver model. Use GET /v0/voices to retrieve available voice options.

language.title: Language
language.description: Language code in BCP-47 format (e.g., 'en-US', 'es-MX', 'ja', 'fr-CA'). For voice targets, improves STT accuracy by constraining language model.

test_input.title: Test Input
test_input.description: Test prompt to which the driver model will respond.

text_response.title: Text Response
text_response.description: The text response generated by the driver model for the test input.

voice_response.title: Voice Response
voice_response.description: The voice response generated by the driver model for the test input, if applicable. Encoded as a base64 string.

progress.title: Progress
progress.description: Number in percent of progress of test run

app_link.title: App Link
app_link.description: This URL links to the Okareo webpage for this test run

driver_id.title: Driver Id
driver_id.description: ID of the driver used for the run, if applicable.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Tags are strings that can be used to filter test runs in the Okareo app

type.description: The type of test run will determine which relevant model metrics should be calculated.

calculate_model_metrics.title: Calculate Model Metrics
calculate_model_metrics.description: Boolean value indicating if model metrics should be calculated

api_keys.title: Api Keys
api_keys.description: Dictionary that maps model type to the respective API keys

metrics_kwargs.title: Metrics Kwargs
metrics_kwargs.description: Dictionary of metrics to be measured

type.description: The type of test run will determine which relevant model metrics should be calculated

calculate_metrics.title: Calculate Metrics
calculate_metrics.description: Boolean value indicating if metrics should be calculated for the test run

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Tags are strings that can be used to filter test runs in the Okareo app

checks.title: Checks
checks.description: List of checks to include in the test run.

simulation_params.title: Simulation Params
simulation_params.description: Simulation parameters for the test run.

driver_id.title: Driver Id
driver_id.description: ID of the driver model to use, if applicable.

nats_invoke_id.title: Nats Invoke Id
nats_invoke_id.description: Optional custom NATS invoke ID for the mut evaluation.

ids.title: Ids
ids.description: IDs of the datapoints to update

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Tags are strings that can be used to filter test data points in the Okareo app

details.title: Details
details.description: Breakdown of metrics by time period based on precision

UsageMetricsResponse.title: UsageMetricsResponse
UsageMetricsResponse.description: Complete response for usage metrics request.

UsagePrecision.title: UsagePrecision
UsagePrecision.description: Time period precision for usage metrics.

project_id.title: Project Id
project_id.description: ID of the project to associate the audio file with.

file_id.title: File Id
file_id.description: Unique identifier for the uploaded audio.

file_url.title: File Url
file_url.description: Link to access the uploaded audio file.

file_duration.title: File Duration
file_duration.description: Duration of the audio file in milliseconds.

time_created.title: Time Created
time_created.description: Timestamp indicating when audio file was created.
